JOB DESCRIPTION: Job description- Good working knowledge on C#, ASP.NET, VB.NET, DOTNET 4.0, HTML5, CSS3, Jquery, Javascript, Crystal Report and XML.- Good working knowledge on Window, Web Application, and Web services.- Working knowledge of SQL server 2014, writing stored procedures, Queries, and Views.- Working knowledge of IIS; like website configuration, maintenance and fine-tuning.- Able to write unit test cases and execute the same.- Able to perform tasks both independently and in a team- Experience of about 1 - 4 years in the e-publishing/typesetting industry preferredNote : Ready to work on Rotational shift including Night Shift.
